abstract: The Goldman Sachs chief also throws cold water on suggestions that it might be time for him to retire: “I am 57. What am I going to do with the other 60 years of my life?”
snippet: The Goldman Sachs chief also throws cold water on suggestions that it might be time for him to retire: “I am 57. What am I going to do with the other 60 years of my life?”
lead_paragraph: CHICAGO — Lloyd C. Blankfein, the chief executive of Goldman Sachs, said in a speech here on Wednesday that the European crisis was at “a very critical moment.”

headline.main: Blankfein Speaks on Europe, the Financial Industry and Dimon
